name: HTTP_TOOLS__GET_URL
description: Fetches content from a URL using CycleTLS, extracts data using LLM instructions, and returns structured data according to the provided schema.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from using GET request.

extraction_instructions.description: LLM instructions for data extraction using GPT-OSS model. Must be specific about what data to extract and how to format it.

output_schema.description: Required JSON schema defining the expected output structure. Must be a valid JSON schema with type definitions and properties. Example: {"type": "object", "properties": {"title": {"type": "string"}, "price": {"type": "number"}}}
